name: @honeymachine/search
description: A search component for the modern web

scripts.build: pnpm run build:tsc & pnpm run build:rollup & wait
scripts.watch: pnpm run watch:tsc & pnpm run watch:rollup
scripts.dev: pnpm run watch & pnpm run serve
scripts.postversion: sed -i '' -E 's:^#<removed temporarily>(lib|docs/assets/hm-\*)$:\1:' .gitignore && git rm --cached -r lib docs/assets/hm-* && git add . && git commit -m 'Restore preversion .gitignore'
scripts.prepack: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
